bill.summary: 7/23/1997--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the health, safety, and general welfare of the residents of the Nation's coalfields should continue to be enhanced by the implementation of the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 by State and Federal regulatory authorities; and (2) the Congress hereby reaffirms the goals of the Act on its 20th anniversary, August 3, 1997.
